text: Eli Stone is an American legal comedy-drama television series, named for its title character. It was created by Greg Berlanti and Marc Guggenheim, who also served as executive producers alongside Ken Olin who directed the pilot, with Melissa Berman producing. The series ran on ABC from January 31, 2008 to July 11, 2009, for two seasons.
